msg: Avoid usage of fixed HTTP port in integration tests.

msg: WHIRR-35. Include .pac file for browsing to Hadoop clusters started on EC2 (Andrei Savu)

author: gstein
msg: The daemonization code resets the umask to 000 to avoid funky parent
process values. We need to set the umask post-daemonization, so that
(Daemon.__init__): add UMASK param and stash it away.
(Daemon.run): possibly set the umask of the process
(main): pass the umask option to the Daemon instance
